sch:schema.title: CTX: 40311: PCC Schematron - Active Problems, based on PCC TF 2:6.4.3.2.3.2

rule.assert: Error: The Active Problems can only be used on sections.
Error: The parent template identifier for Active Problems is not present.
Error: The section type code of a Active Problems must be 11450-4
Error: The section type code must come from the LOINC code system (2.16.840.1.113883.6.1).
Error: A Active Problems must contain Problem Concern Entry. See http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.6
